activities: Participants take our online assessments and provide us with first name, last name and email addresses. In some cases we collect gender. This information is used when creating PDF reports based off their answers to assessment questionnaires. Once the PDF reports are created and supplied they are removed from our system. All data is saved based off numeric identifiers. Each participant can log into their accounts to obtain their reports and modify their personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data is covered. Nothing is done manually.
